title: [BUG] Le-blanc Chain
body: In game it has happened basically everytime she has chained me there seems to be a much bigger tether length than normal its almost as if its unbreakable. Please look into this riot. Thankyou veteran player - Porta3

replies.body: It's a really big tether range nornally. Always has been
Yeah it's massive and annoying, and sadly not a bug :/
You would most likely have to prove that xD But yeah video, picture *with the length* or idk.
